objects.description: Monitor executed commands and arguments that may attempt to extract credential material from the Security Account Manager (SAM) database either through in-memory techniques or through the Windows Registry where the SAM database is stored. Analytic 1 - Unauthorized attempts to dump SAM database through command execution. index=security sourcetype="Powershell" EventCode=4104 Image="*powershell.exe" CommandLine IN ("*Invoke-Mimikatz*", "*Invoke-SAMDump*", "*reg save hklm\\sam*", "*reg.exe save hklm\\sam*")
